title: Social Media & Outreach Coordinator
job_overview:
ROLE SUMMARY
We at Glyph Consulting are seeking a dynamic and organized individual to join our team as our Social Media & Outreach Coordinator. This pivotal role will support Glyph’s Accounts Director in securing business leads via creative social media posts & interaction, inbound & outbound lead curation, and market research. The ideal candidate will excel in their written communication and task management, with a keen eye for detail, a proactive approach to problem-solving, and an ability to improvise when necessary.

WHO ARE GLYPH CONSULTING?
Glyph Consulting is a boutique talent consultancy launched in early 2024 that's become a trusted partner for real estate media agencies looking to scale with the right people. Since our founding, we have supported over 40 hires across 30+ real estate media companies throughout the United States, helping creative entrepreneurs move out of the weeds and into true leadership. Our work blends strategic hiring, operational clarity, and a whole lot of people sense. We talk with you, identify your business woes, and streamline a path to success.

ROLE & RESPONSIBILITIES
- Manage Glyph’s social media accounts and content calendar with focuses on posts & stories, follower generation, and audience engagement. 
- Engage with previous Glyph clients to collaborate on social media posts and/or generate lead referrals.
- Conduct market research and manage outreach to support the Accounts Director in organic lead curation.
- Organize and maintain a CRM system for all of Glyph’s clients— past, present, and future.
- Deliver regular updates to the Operations Director, escalating roadblocks as needed, in a daily standup meeting.
- Assist the Accounts Director with tasks and administrative support as needed.

SKILLS & QUALIFICATIONS
- You have at least one year of experience in a marketing, administrative, or social media-focused role.
- You have a strong understanding of social media platforms and content optimization (Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, etc).
- You are proficient in working with Google Suite, Canva, and other editing tools.
- You understand the importance of attention to detail.
- You possess strong problem-solving and decision-making skills.
- You are professional and showcase a positive attitude and excellent customer service skills.

COMPENSATION, WORK HOURS & BENEFITS
- Pay will be $5.00-7.00 USD per hour (based on experience). 
- Work schedule will be 10 hours per week, with potential to scale up to 20 hours per week after 3 months of employment.
- Availability will be required outside of standard business hours (8:00A-6:00P) in order to attend meetings with the Operations Director and/or the Accounts Director.
- Potential to develop a long-term growth/salary track after 6 months of employment.
